name: System shell profile scripts
description: An adversary may wish to establish persistence by adding commands into any of the script files in the /etc/profile.d/ directory, which are executed every time "any" user logs in.

data.command: sed -i "s/# Atomic Red Team was here... T1546.004//" /etc/profile.d/bash_completion.sh

input_arguments.name: text_to_append
input_arguments.description: Text to append to the /etc/profile.d/bash_completion.sh file
input_arguments.value: # Atomic Red Team was here... T1546.004
